title: Kha'zix tips?
body:
I have been playing kha zix for quite some time and haven't seemed to be that great with him any tips in jungle or lane?
I appreciate all comments :D

Oh and is there a better jungler out there?

replies.body:
banner of command + omhwrecker + zzrot + thornmail + hydra + mercs.

legit the best build in the world for kha sux....and anyone actually...change hydra for some reliable damage item for ranged. (nashors/BORK work nicely, but gunblade is by far my fav.)

Hello thank you for the comment and I have my own biuld so I wanted you too see if it is sufficent(this is my jungle biuld btw)- Jungle item, hydra, black cleaver, maw, rands. Also my jungle item is the stalkers blade with the red enchantment. If you suggest I should change my jungle item then please tell me thank you :D

Black clear can be switched out for last whisper most games, while black cleaver is good (giving him everything it needs) sometimes, (and this is going based of your build) you'll need the raw damage of the last whisper to kill people where you don't have the time to get the % damage. But i suppose its preference.
But usually I get black cleaver just to get some ad and health so kha zix isn't so squishy and I have never tried last whisper do you suggest I should?
Also is kha zix a good jungler?
Watch the video where faker plays him, and you will become a senpai.

i play kha zix as a zoning AOE, rather than the old assassin. because i find he does a LOT less burst now. and can barely kill people quick enough even when ahead.

warrior + brut into LW would be the old style.
now i go warrior tiamat into tanky. sometimes brut instead of tiamat. but warrior hydra, with the tankyness from my build, makes him so deadly with Q AA resets and W AOE but also tanky enough that people are usually scared to come near me, even 3 vs 1. so i can zone out squishies while my team deals with the front line.
late game iso Qs are still deadly enough that if someone steps out of place, a well timed EWQAAHYDRAAA combo can take them out pretty fast.

personally i find maw underwhelming. but for my play style with kha, tanky zoner works really well. plus i mostly play him in ranked teams rather than solo. (mainly cos i dont think he can carry in solo queue anymore)

i start W with a strong leash on krugs, or if im forced to start blue side i start Q cos gromp. so W Q or Q W depending on start.
starting red side i can clear whole jungle and get a gank off before needing to B usually.
Thanks a lot for the information king digger :D
